results.name: Primes as a sum of prime factors and their orders in prime decomposition of some n.
comment: Primes occurring in A008474. Corresponding n's in A107738. Cf. A008474 If n = Product (p_j^k_j) then a(n) = Sum (p_j + k_j).
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Factorization
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, May 23 2005
